segments.text: My eyes immediately go to that precarious stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting, the legs splayed out at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched so far, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any sudden movement and he's going to come crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is already so wet from the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine him falling onto that slippery surface, or worse, hitting the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, bless her heart, is completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing her plate, utterly lost in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the water rising around her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for multiple accidents right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a knot in my stomach just watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before things get really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me incredibly anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
